summary: 增加ARMS Prometheus监控的聚合实例，获取指定聚合实例的详细数据源情况。

Data.example: {     "clusterId":"聚合实例ClusterId",     "groupName":"聚合实例名称",     "dataSources":[         {             "sourceName":"数据源名称- ArmsPrometheus No.1",             "sourceType":"AlibabaPrometheus",             "userId":"UserID",             "clusterId":"ClusterId"         },       // more datasources     ] }

Code.description: 状态码。200为成功，其他状态码为异常。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "Data": "{     \"clusterId\":\"聚合实例ClusterId\",     \"groupName\":\"聚合实例名称\",     \"dataSources\":[         {             \"sourceName\":\"数据源名称- ArmsPrometheus No.1\",             \"sourceType\":\"AlibabaPrometheus\",             \"userId\":\"UserID\",             \"clusterId\":\"ClusterId\"         },       // more datasources     ] }",
  "RequestId": "743AD493-D006-53BD-AAEC-DDCE7FB68EA7",
  "Code": 200,
  "Message": "success"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<GetPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>
    <Data>{     "clusterId":"聚合实例ClusterId",     "groupName":"聚合实例名称",     "dataSources":[         {             "sourceName":"数据源名称- ArmsPrometheus No.1",             "sourceType":"AlibabaPrometheus",             "userId":"UserID",             "clusterId":"ClusterId"         },       // more datasources     ] }</Data>
    <RequestId>743AD493-D006-53BD-AAEC-DDCE7FB68EA7</RequestId>
</GetPrometheusGlobalViewResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取聚合实例的数据源详情
